♪: Capo 1st fret for this tab to match the studio recorded version of the song. If deciding to play
   along with the song without a capo, transpose this chord chart -1 for the chords to match the song.


[Intro]
[ch]F[/ch]   [ch]E7[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]C7[/ch]


[Verse 1]
                        [ch]F[/ch]
Thought I'd end up with Sean
                [ch]E7[/ch]
But he wasn't a match
                       [ch]Am[/ch]
Wrote some songs about Ricky
                 [ch]C7[/ch]
Now I listen and laugh
                [ch]F[/ch]
Even almost got married
                     [ch]E7[/ch]
And for Pete, I'm so thankful
                                 [ch]Am[/ch]
Wish I could say, "Thank you" to Malcolm
                 [ch]C7[/ch]
'Cause he was an angel


[Pre-Chorus]
              [ch]F[/ch]
One taught me love
              [ch]E7[/ch]
One taught me patience
                  [ch]Am[/ch]
And one taught me pain
             [ch]C7[/ch]
Now, I'm so amazing
                    [ch]F[/ch]
I've loved and I've lost
                    [ch]E7[/ch]
But that's not what I see
                [ch]Am[/ch]
So, look what I got
              [ch]C7[/ch]
Look what you taught me
                [ch]F[/ch]
And for that, I say


[Chorus]
                 [ch]E7[/ch]
Thank you, next (Next)
                 [ch]Am[/ch]
Thank you, next (Next)

Thank you, next
[ch]C7[/ch]                             [ch]F[/ch]
I'm so fuckin' grateful for my ex
                 [ch]E7[/ch]
Thank you, next (Next)
                 [ch]Am[/ch]
Thank you, next (Next)

Thank you, next (Next)
[ch]C7[/ch]
I'm so fuckin'


[Verse 2]
                        [ch]F[/ch]
Spend more time with my friends
                      [ch]E7[/ch]
I ain't worried 'bout nothin'
                    [ch]Am[/ch]
Plus, I met someone else
                    [ch]C7[/ch]
We havin' better discussions
                       [ch]F[/ch]
I know they say I move on too fast
